Articles.Content: As a xbox user I think we need mods for xbox.

Welcome to the forums!

Sadly, the way consoles work; distributing mods is very difficult. I doubt we'll ever see mods for KSP on consoles.

My hope is that with the unity upgrade for ee they will also upgrade to ksp 1.6 and when they have ironed out the dv calculation in 1.6 we will have ingame dv readouts. At least that's what i'm dreaming

I'm gonna assume it's still gonna be a few versions behind, just because that's how these things usually go.

I hope I'm wrong though, for all you console players sake.
